com.jrefinery.chart
Class Plot

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.jrefinery.chart.Plot
All Implemented Interfaces:
AxisChangeListener, ChartChangeListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
BarPlot, HighLowPlot, LinePlot, PiePlot, VerticalXYBarPlot, XYPlot
public abstract class Plot
extends java.lang.Object
implements AxisChangeListener, ChartChangeListener

A 'plot' is a class that controls the visual representation of data - all the different types of plots share a common structure that is defined by this base class.

setVerticalAxis

public void setVerticalAxis(Axis axis)
                     throws AxisNotCompatibleException
Sets the vertical axis for the plot.

An exception is thrown if the new axis and the plot are not mutually compatible.

Parameters:
axis - The new axis (null permitted).

                       throws AxisNotCompatibleException

chartChanged

public void chartChanged(ChartChangeEvent event)
Receives notification of a change to a (the) chart.

Reacts to dataset changes by reconfiguring the axes.

Specified by:
chartChanged in interface ChartChangeListener
Parameters:
event - Information about the chart change event.
